name: The arcane leggings of Rulership *dark aura*
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than avarage.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'immolate'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
